word: Not only will the students themselves be benefited by a study of the Word of God. Their study is life and salvation to all with whom they associate. They will feel a sacred responsibility to impart the knowledge that they receive. Their lives will reveal the help and strength that they receive from communion with the Word. . . . Of such ones the Lord Jesus can indeed say, \93Ye are laborers together with God.\94\97Counsels on Health, pp. 370-372.
